meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being rude or ill-mannered.
meanings.sent1: His boorishnesses were evident when he interrupted others constantly.
meanings.sent2: The party was ruined by the guests' boorishnesses.
meanings.sent3: Despite his boorishnesses, he somehow managed to charm everyone with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The boorishnesses of his behavior were like a dark cloud hanging over the gathering.
meanings.sent5: The teacher addressed the issue of boorishnesses in the classroom with a stern warning.

meanings.definition: Acts or behaviors that are uncouth or lacking in refinement.
meanings.sent1: The boorishnesses of his table manners were hard to ignore.
meanings.sent2: She was embarrassed by the boorishnesses displayed by her date.
meanings.sent3: The boorishnesses of the dog stealing food from the table made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The boorishnesses of the city streets at night made her uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The boorishnesses of his speech left a lasting impression on the audience.
